data.convo: Good afternoon , madam . May I help you ? Do you have some new perfume ? I am sorry , madam . I didn't hear you . It's too noisy here . Could you please say it again ? Well , I wanna buy some new perfume . Would you please wait a minute ? I will get one for you at once . That's all right . Here you are . Can I open it ? Yes , certainly , madam . It smells sweet . Yes , it is . This perfume just arrived yesterday , and it's the latest products of Chanel . Really ? How much is it ? 55 dollars , madam . Ok , I will take two bottles . Thank you . Do you need something else ? No , thanks .
